name: Shinobit
description:
Utilize your ninja skills and tools at your disposal to survive for as long as you can in this fast-paced 2D arena game!

Shinobit was created by Daniel HCC for Miz Jam #1, utilizing assets from Kenney's "1-bit pack". 
This was my very first gamejam project working alone, and I'm quite happy with the result!

Music: SubspaceAudio @ OpenGameArt.org
Font: Press Start 2P @ dafont.com
